entries.meaning: simple past tense and past participle of trolley

description: Originally a slang term among students.

adjectives.description: trollied (comparative more trollied, superlative most trollied)

examples: THIS year we got smashed, tanked up, trollied, pie-eyed, caned, wankered, mullered, inebriated, wrecked, pissed, slated, hammered, paralytic and well and truly out of our trees. We have more words for getting drunk than we do for being in love.
